instructions: Made for the BESM 4th Edition Extras rules.

useroptions.description:
Set this value to the name of the GM sheet. The GM sheet contains all the rule data that each player sheet will query for rolls and changes to Stats, Attributes, Defects, and customizations.
If this value is not set correctly across all character sheets, players with the incorrect settings will receive the following message in chat, 'No character was found for ...'.
Set this value to the number of character points characters should start with.
